text: Santa Maria is a municipality (town) in the province of Bulacan, Philippines. It lies 32 kilometers northeast of Manila and is located at the eastern portion of the province. It is surrounded by the towns of Angat and Pandi in the north; by San Jose del Monte City in the south; by Norzagaray in the east; and by Marilao and Bocaue in the west. According to the 2007 Philippine national census (a total count of the country's population), it has 205,258 people. It is divided into 24 barangays (villages). These barangays are: # Bagbaguin # Balasing # Buenavista # Bulac # Camangyanan # Catmon # Caypombo # Caysio # Guyong # Lalakhan # Mag-asawang Sapa # Mahabang Parang # Manggahan # Parada # Poblacion (Santa Maria town proper) # Pulong Buhangin # San Gabriel # San Jose Patag # San Vicente # Santa Clara # Santa Cruz # Silangan # Tabing Bakod (Santo Tomas) # Tumana ==Sources== ==Other websites== * Santa Maria, My Kind of Town * Official Website of the Municipality of Santa Maria, Bulacan * Santa Maria Map | Philippines Google Satellite Maps * NSCB - ActiveStats - PSGC Interactive - Municipality: SANTA MARIA * Philippine Census Information * Philippine Standard Geographic Code Category:Settlements in the Philippines Category:1640s establishments Category:Bulacan Category:17th-century establishments in Asia
title: Santa Maria, Bulacan
